Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.6 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.6.3 Paccayavāra » 10.6.3.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 10.6.3.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
207.
2822Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe cha, naupanissaye cha, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
<< 10.6.3.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup10.6.3.3--4 Paccayānulomapaccanīya-paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
